title: Community Child Care Connection Region Child Care Resource and Referral contract for Service Delivery Area 13

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Find the Community Child Care Connection Region Child Care Resource and Referral contract for Service Delivery Area 13. https://www.inccrra.org/about/sdasearch/sda/13

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Responses to RFI # 23-3052 California Supporting Providers and Reaching Kids (CalSPARK) Core

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please find all responses to RFI # 23-3052 California Supporting Providers and Reaching Kids (CalSPARK) Core issued by the California Department of Social Services.  Responses to the RFI were due on 9/21/2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A .csv file containing metadata of all emails sent or received by email address(es) former ICE official Daniel Bible used for official government business during the period beginning January 1, 2024, and continuing through November 6, 2024, containing the domain "@geogroup.com" in the To, From, CC, or BCC lines. The .csv file metadata should contain the sender, recipient(s), date sent, time sent, date received, time received, email subject line, attachment name(s), attachment file size(s), priority status, and read receipt status. 

I make this request as a member of the media primarily engaged in information dissemination, and accordingly, request a fee waiver. 

I request expedited processing of this request under 6 C.F.R. 5.5(e), and in support thereof, I make the following statements under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 1746: 
1. A January 17, 2025, report from the Project on Government Oversight revealed former ICE official Daniel Bible notified ICE Ethics of his intent to transition from employment for ICE to employment for ICE's leading detention contractor, The GEO Group, in November 2024. See https://www.pogo.org/investigations/private-prison-giant-hired-ice-detention-chief. 

2. The end of Mr. Bible's federal employment with ICE, if it occurred, will have been less than one year before the beginning of his planned employment with The GEO Group, if it occurred.

3. Federal law prohibits certain government officials from working for contractors within one year after they leave federal government under certain circumstances. 

4. GEO previously violated this federal prohibition by hiring former ICE official Tracey Valerio as purported expert in litigation. See: https://www.thedailybeast.com/ex-ice-official-paid-to-defend-dollar1-a-day-wages-for-immigrants/. 

5. ICE Ethics imposed no publicly acknowledged penalty against GEO for violating this revolving-door provision. 

6. ICE has unlawfully refused to provide records regarding Ms. Valerio's tenure at ICE for the past six years: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/tracey-valerio-immigration-and-customs-enforcement-72985/#file-1037660. 

7. Similarly, former ICE custody management director and acting ICE director Tae Johnson sought and obtained employment with GEO, which began less than one year after his departure from the agency. https://www.geogroup.com/media/5twe5h5c/4ee9aaae-a38b-4f10-83eb-97c0f8f0c503.pdf. 

8. ICE has unlawfully refused to provide records regarding Mr. Johnson's tenure at ICE for the past 19 months. https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/tae-johnson-death-emails-145670/. 

9. ICE medical officials have repeatedly concluded GEO's failure to comply with the standards set forth in ICE contracts and its own policies have contributed to or caused the deaths in federal custody at or following their detention in GEO facilities. 

10. ICE continues to contract with GEO, and is poised to enter into additional detention contracts with the company worth billions of dollars over the next several years. 

11. The public and policymakers will not have the information to evaluate the efficacy and lawfulness of these contractual arrangements if ICE continues to withhold responsive records for years. 

12. There is an urgent need to inform the public about this actual or alleged government misconduct. 

13. GEO's profitability and increased detention opportunities have been the subject of widespread media attention. See, e.g., 
a. https://www.npr.org/2025/01/16/nx-s1-5218641/immigrant-detention-trump-deportation-plans
b. https://www.sfchronicle.com/politics/article/migrants-minimum-wage-20039275.php
c. https://www.axios.com/2025/01/15/ice-detention-expansion-biden-trump-deportation
d. https://www.forbes.com/sites/michellembekeani/2025/01/12/will-mass-deportation-be-a-moneymaker-for-private-prisons/
e. https://calmatters.org/politics/capitol/2024/07/detainees-immigrants-labor-rights/
f. https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2024/07/private-prison-giant-geo-group-ramps-up-lobbying-on-immigrant-surveillance/
g. https://www.capradio.org/articles/2024/12/09/ice-is-looking-for-a-new-detention-center-in-blue-california-the-state-probably-cant-stop-it/
f. https://prismreports.org/2024/06/25/nearly-all-deaths-in-ice-detention-over-5-years-were-preventable/
g. https://prismreports.org/2024/04/01/ice-cruelty-kills-another-migrant-solitary-confinement/
h. https://newjerseymonitor.com/2024/04/19/private-prison-company-eyes-newark-site-for-new-ice-jail/
i. https://sherwood.news/markets/geo-group-ice-immigration-contractor-trump-election-bump/
j. https://www.vvdailypress.com/story/news/2024/10/22/adelanto-immigration-customs-enforcement-ice-detention-center-to-remain-open-california/75780811007/
k. https://arkansasadvocate.com/2024/08/01/private-prison-giant-geo-group-ramps-up-lobbying-on-immigrant-surveillance/


Please grant expedited processing of this request and comply with the statutory provisions of the Freedom of Information Act.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

1. Water quality testing results for Nancy B Jefferson High School
2. Water quality testing results for Consuela B York High School

Provide any water quality testing results from 2016 to current. Per the CPS property lease database, Nancy B Jefferson and Consuela B York High Schools are CPS owned properties (attached documentation). 

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
